ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 13 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:

<4> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <5> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <6> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<7> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <8> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <9> PD 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters +
<10> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <12> LCD Screen Protectors + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with 64GB Card + Battery & Charger + Backpack Case + 3 UV/CPL/ND8 Filters + Tripod + Telephoto & Wide-Angle Lenses + Accessory Kit
